snippet.title: Xeno Crisis Kickstarter video
snippet.description:
Here's our Kickstarter campaign video for Xeno Crisis - a new Sega Mega Drive / Genesis game to be released October 2018 to coincide with the 30th anniversary of the Mega Drive's launch in Japan.

We're working with legendary pixel artist Henk Nieborg (The Misadventures Of Flink, Shantae, Contra 4 etc), Catherine Menabde and Savaged Regime to produce a sumptuous arena shooter that takes inspiration from Smash TV, Mercs, Alien Syndrome, Zombies Ate My Neighbours and several others.

Check out the Kickstarter here:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1676714319/xeno-crisis-a-new-game-for-the-sega-genesis-mega-d
